game.name: Dream Swing
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Grapple and air-strafe your way to the top of the Leaderboard in this fast-paced movement-based time trial. Collect as many candies as possible within 5 minutes as you dip and weave around the ruins in the sky. Can you handle the speed?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Grapple and air-strafe your way to the top of the Leaderboard in this fast-paced movement-based time trial. Collect as many candies as possible within 5 minutes as you dip and weave around the ruins in the sky. Can you handle the speed?
